text: Ezɨ Atrivim Ahap akar kam baregha, Israelian gumazir dapanibar diazɨ, me iza uari akuvazɨ, a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia gan, gumazir kam osɨmtɨziba buri. A faragha ghaze nɨ uan amuiba ko boriba, ko silvaba ko golba na danɨngigh. Ezɨ kɨ an akamɨn amamangatɨ. Ezɨ a uam akam gɨra, kar a ti e gasɨghasɨghasa.”
